name: CoastSoccerLeague
0:
”Alexa open coast soccer league”
”Alexa ask coast soccer league when is my next game”
”Alexa ask coast soccer league what are our standings”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: coast soccer league
des:
Ask Alexa 
 
• When is my next game?
 Recites the next game details like date and time according to the schedule.

• What are our standings? 
 Recites the progress of the selected team.

• What is our coach's phone number?
 Recites the selected teams coach's phone number.

• How many cards does our team have?
 Recites the cards issued to the selected team.

• What was the score of our last game?
 Recitest the score of the last game played by the selected team.
 
• What is the weather report for our next game?
 Recites the weather forecast for the location of next game.

• How long will it take to get to our next game or How many days to our next game? 
 Recites the number of days to next game.

• How many cards does {TEAM NAME} {GENDER} {YEAR} {BRACKET} have?
 Allows the user to specify custom Team , Gender , Year and Bracket to know the cards issued for the team.

• When does {TEAM NAME} {GENDER} {YEAR} [BRACKET} play next?
Allows the user to know next game time with respect to the choosen Team , Gender , Year and Bracket . 

More coming soon!!

This skill requires account linking.
